"Projecting the items from your mobile device's screen on a bigger external monitor."
"Casting is projecting the items from your mobile device's screen on a bigger external monitor. It allows you to share images and videos with your friends and family without using mobile data."
"Tap the \"Cast\" toggle on your device's Notification shade. Turn on both WLAN and Bluetooth for a more stable connection."

"You can project items from your Xiaomi device on most Mi TV models with Bluetooth capabilities without turning on Miracast manually. If you need to turn on Miracast, press the [MENU] button and select My apps > Casting > Miracast."

string.Data: "Welcome to Casting! Casting allows projecting the items from your mobile device's screen on a bigger external monitor. Before using this feature, read and agree to HappyCast Legal Statement and HappyCast Privacy Policy.
